data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Bến Tre, Vietnam. Please, stir the 29,104 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bến Tre, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Bến Tre, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Bến Tre, Vietnam to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, 1,345,600 people live in the state of Bến Tre. Please, give them 269 new simple churches this year.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Bih people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,208,562 who are far from you in Bến Tre, Vietnam from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 29,104 believers in the state of Bến Tre the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Bến Tre, Vietnam to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.
